Nurumia

Dashboard and Social Network

{/* End Breadcrump Area */} {/* Start Portfolio Details */}

Greenhouse Control

Interface for a greenhouse electronic automation system, designed and built by myself.

It includes a Chat, Shared Calendar task manager, and I create a PHP API to handle the information received from IoT devices that I also designed and manufactured. Developed with ReactJS and NodeJs. It uses Firebase to store and filter the data. As well, as a way to authenticate the users. For the data received from the sensors it uses PHP and MySQL.

Technologies Used:

ReactJs, NodeJs, HTML, CSS, Php, Firebase, MySQL, C++.
